title: The discontented plow-man. This man was troubled in his mind, because his love did prove to him unkind; but now, she has granted his desire, and quench'd his lovesick heart which was on fire [sic] To the tune of, True love rewarded, or, Flora farewel.
publisher: Printed for F[rancis]. Coles, T[homas]. Vere, I[ohn]. Wright, and I[ohn]. Clarke.,
